strings.Value: "I am so grateful to fate for giving me a chance to repent..."
"Repent? Why do you imagine treachery is something that can be repented?"
"Everyone makes mistakes sometimes, Tristian. But not everyone is ready to accept and try to fix their mistakes."
"You should thank {name} for not letting me do all I'm supposed to do to you by the laws of the tribeâ€¦"
